# CPTextButtonStyle

**Enumeration**

The styles a button can apply to its title to communicate its action.

## Declaration

```swift
enum CPTextButtonStyle
```

## Button Text Styles

- **CPTextButtonStyle.normal**: A style that indicates the button performs an action other than to confirm or cancel.
- **CPTextButtonStyle.confirm**: A style that indicates the button confirms an action and changes data.
- **CPTextButtonStyle.cancel**: A style that indicates the button cancels an action and doesn’t change data.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Managing the Button Style

- **textStyle**: The text style the button applies to its title.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
